title: Fat controller â€” business logic belongs in service object
description: Task creation logic including notification and status calculation is inline in the controller. CONTRIBUTING.md requires service objects for business logic.

title: Mass assignment vulnerability
description: Task.new(params[:task]) permits all parameters without strong parameter filtering. Should use strong parameters to whitelist allowed attributes.

title: N+1 query on task.project.name
description: Iterating tasks and accessing task.project.name triggers a separate database query per task. Missing .includes(:project) in controller query.

title: Missing presence validation on title
description: Task model has no validation for title presence, allowing blank tasks to be created.

title: Inconsistent error handling pattern
description: Error handling uses rescue inline instead of controller-level rescue_from, inconsistent with the rest of the application.
